metadata.title: CVE-2021-39257 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A crafted NTFS image with an unallocated bitmap can lead to a endless recursive function call chain (starting from ntfs_attr_pwrite), causing stack consumption in NTFS-3G < 2021.8.22.

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2017.3.23AR.3-3ubuntu4.1').
